trans-unit.source: Conflicting extensions should be uninstalled for %s to function correctly.
trans-unit.target: Widersprüchliche Erweiterungen sollten deinstalliert werden, damit %s korrekt funktioniert.

trans-unit.source: Required extensions should be installed for %s to function correctly.
trans-unit.target: Widersprüchliche Erweiterungen sollten deinstalliert werden, damit %s korrekt funktioniert.

trans-unit.source: Use the Install tool to set the front end login security level ($TYPO3_CONF_VARS['FE']['loginSecurityLevel']) to "", "normal" or "rsa".
trans-unit.target: Benutzen Sie das Installationswerkzeug, um das Front-End-Sicherheitslevel ($TYPO3_CONF_VARS['FE']['loginSecurityLevel']) auf "", "normal" oder "rsa" zu setzen.

trans-unit.source: For %s to function correctly, the global variable %s must have the value "%s".
trans-unit.target: Damit %s korrekt funktioniert, muss die globale Variable %s den Wert "%s " haben.

trans-unit.source: For %s to function correctly, extension "saltedpasswords" must be installed and must be configured so that salted passwords are enabled in front end. Note that if front end login security level ($TYPO3_CONF_VARS['FE']['loginSecurityLevel']) is not set to "", "normal" or "rsa", then salted passwords cannot be enabled in front end.
trans-unit.target: For %s to function correctly, extension "saltedpasswords" must be installed and must be configured so that salted passwords are enabled in front end. Note that if front end login security level ($TYPO3_CONF_VARS['FE']['loginSecurityLevel']) is not set to "", "normal" or "rsa", then salted passwords cannot be enabled in front end.
